text: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
author: Bernard Shaw

text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life
author: Steve Jobs

text: No two persons ever read the same book.
author: Woodrow Wilson

text: While we are postponing, life speeds by.
author: Seneca

text: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Gray

text: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
author: Charles Darwin

text: Love the life you live, and live the life you love.
author: Bob Marley

text: Never regret anything that made you smile.
author: Mark Twain

text: Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
author: William Faulkner

text: If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking.
author: Haruki Murakami

text: We must run as fast as we can, just to stay in place. And if you wish to go anywhere you must run twice as fast as that.
author: Lewis Carroll, the book "Alice in Wonderland"

text: Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
author: film "The Godfather"

text: What we do in life echoes in eternity.
author: film "Gladiator"

text: We buy things we don’t need, to impress people we don’t like.
author: the movie "Fight Club"

text: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

text: Love is a friendship set to music.
author: Joseph Campbell

text: Real beauty lives in the heart, is reflected in the eyes and leads to action.
author: Osho

text: When love is not madness it is not love.
author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

text: True love stories never have endings.
author: Richard Bach

text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles Swindall

text: As long as man continues to be the ruthless destroyer of lower living beings he will never know health or peace. For as long as men massacre animals, they will kill each other.
author: Pythagoras

text: Every day can not be good, but there is something good in every day.
author: Alice Morse Earl

text: Life is a series of choices.
author: Nostradamus

text: Life is a progress, and not a station.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: You can never understand one language until you understand at least two.
author: Jeffrey Willans

text: You can never be overdressed or overeducated.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

text: We receive three educations, one from our parents, one from our schoolmasters, and one from the world. The third contradicts all that the first two teach us.
author: Charles-Louis de Montesquieu

text: Love what you do. Do what you love
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: The Buddha

text: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

text: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That’s my religion.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: I'd rather be hated for who I am, than loved for who I am not.
author: Kurt Cobain

text: Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
author: Bernard Shaw

text: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won’t expect it back.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Formal education will make you a living. Self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Ron

text: Money speaks sense in a language all nations understand.
author: Afra Ben

text: Don't gain the world and lose your soul, wisdom is better than silver or gold.
author: Bob Marley

text: Language extends hidden power, like the moon on the tides.
author: Rita Mae Brown

text: Life is a foreign language: all men mispronounce it.
author: Christopher Morley

text: A different language is a different vision of life.
author: Federico Fellini

text: A mind enclosed in language is in prison.
author: Simone Weil

text: Neither can embellishments of language be found without arrangement and expression of thoughts, nor can thoughts be made to shine without the light of language.
author: Cicero

text: A day without laughter is a day wasted
author: Charlie Chaplin

text: Always laugh when you can. It is cheap medicine
author: George Byron

text: The advantage of a bad memory is that one enjoys several times the same good things for the first time
author: Nietzsche
